name: Corridied
description:
Description

You play as a bull during a Bullfight, people think they can sacrifice you for their entertainment but you not any bull, you THE Bull, so show them how entertaining you can be ! 

This game was made during the Mini Jam 110 : Sacrifice. 

This is a two-person team, and our first game so we hope you liked it.

SapinSympa: Art, sound and musics.

MrNetaz: Programmer.

Controls:

Movements: WASD or ZQSD

Bull Charge: Shift

Exit Game: Escape
